snippet.title: Streets of Rage 4 - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/985890/Streets_of_Rage_4/  
PS4 USA: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1482-CUSA16237_00-00STREETSOFRAGE4
Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/streets-of-rage-4-switch/ 
PS4 EU: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1470-CUSA16221_00-00STREETSOFRAGE4
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/streets_of_rage_4
Humble Bundle: https://fr.humblebundle.com/store/streets-of-rage-4
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/streets-of-rage-4/9n7h54kncb9n?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

The wait is over! Streets of Rage 4 is now available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One for $24,99!

The first mainline series entry in more than 25 years, Streets of Rage 4 infuses the series’ classic elements with modern evolutions of gameplay, art and design, giving fans an authentically faithful tribute which still offers a distinctive experience.

Check all the info about the game on its Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/985890/Streets_of_Rage_4/

Send love to @Dotemu, @Lizardcube, and @Guard_Crush’s on Twitter, and join our amazing fans on Discord: https://discord.gg/DvVq4yz.

©SEGA, ©2020 Dotemu, all rights reserved. Developed by Lizardcube, Guard Crush Games and Dotemu

#SOR4 #dotemu #retrogaming
